slides.title: Welcome to Taxation
slides.content:
# Direct & Indirect Taxation

Taxation covers **income tax** and **GST** in India.

## What You Will Learn

- **Income Tax** - Direct taxation
- **GST** - Indirect taxation
- **Compliance** - Filing requirements
- **Planning** - Tax optimization

## Tax Structure

| Type | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Direct | Income tax, Corporation tax |
| Indirect | GST, Customs |

slides.title: Income Tax Basics
slides.content:
# Income Tax Framework

## Heads of Income

| Head | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Salary | Employment |
| House Property | Rent |
| PGBP | Business |
| Capital Gains | Asset sale |
| Other Sources | Interest |

## Tax Calculation

```
Gross Total Income
- Chapter VI-A Deductions
= Total Taxable Income
x Applicable Rate
= Tax Liability
- Rebate/Relief
= Net Tax
```

slides.title: Corporate Taxation
slides.content:
# Company Tax

## Rates

| Company Type | Rate |
|--------------|------|
| Domestic (general) | 25% + surcharge |
| New manufacturing | 15% |
| MAT | 15% of book profit |

## MAT

```
Minimum Alternate Tax
Payable when normal < MAT

MAT Credit can be carried forward
```

## Dividend Tax

- DDT abolished
- Taxable in hands of recipient

slides.title: Capital Gains
slides.content:
# Capital Gains Tax

## Holding Period

| Asset | LTCG if held |
|-------|-------------|
| Listed shares | > 12 months |
| Real estate | > 24 months |
| Others | > 36 months |

## Calculation

```
Sale price
- Cost of acquisition (indexed)
- Improvement cost
- Transfer expenses
= Capital Gain
```

## Tax Rates

| Type | Rate |
|------|------|
| STCG (equity) | 15% |
| LTCG (equity) | 10% > Rs 1 lakh |
| Other LTCG | 20% with indexation |

slides.title: GST Overview
slides.content:
# Goods and Services Tax

## Structure

| Tax | Applicability |
|-----|---------------|
| CGST | Central |
| SGST | State |
| IGST | Interstate |
| UTGST | Union territory |

## Taxable Event

```
Supply of goods or services

Supply = Sale, transfer, lease, exchange
```

## Rate Structure

- 0%, 5%, 12%, 18%, 28%

slides.title: GST Registration
slides.content:
# Registration

## Thresholds

| Supply | Threshold |
|--------|----------|
| Services | Rs 20 lakh |
| Goods | Rs 40 lakh |
| Interstate | Nil |

## GSTIN

```
15 digits:
- State code (2)
- PAN (10)
- Entity code (1)
- Z default (1)
- Check digit (1)
```

## Composition

- Turnover < Rs 1.5 crore
- Lower rate
- No input credit

slides.title: Input Tax Credit
slides.content:
# ITC Mechanism

## Eligibility

| Allowed | Blocked |
|---------|--------|
| Business use | Personal |
| Taxable supply | Exempt |
| Proper documents | Food, club |

## Conditions

- Invoice/document
- Goods/services received
- Tax paid by supplier
- Return filed

## ITC Reversal

- Non-payment within 180 days
- Exempt use
- Capital goods disposal

slides.title: GST Returns
slides.content:
# Filing Requirements

## Regular Returns

| Return | Due Date | Purpose |
|--------|----------|--------|
| GSTR-1 | 11th | Outward supply |
| GSTR-3B | 20th | Summary |
| GSTR-9 | 31st Dec | Annual |

## Compliance

| Action | Consequence |
|--------|-------------|
| Late filing | Interest |
| Non-filing | ITC blocked |
| Wrong info | Penalty |

slides.title: TDS and TCS
slides.content:
# Tax at Source

## TDS

| Section | Payment | Rate |
|---------|---------|------|
| 192 | Salary | Slab |
| 194A | Interest | 10% |
| 194C | Contractor | 1%/2% |
| 194J | Professional | 10% |

## GST TDS

- Government departments
- 2% on taxable value
- > Rs 2.5 lakh payment

## TCS

- Collection by seller
- Specific goods/services

slides.title: International Taxation
slides.content:
# Cross-Border Tax

## Residence

| Status | Income Taxed |
|--------|-------------|
| Resident | Worldwide |
| Non-resident | India source |

## DTAA

```
Double Taxation Avoidance Agreement

Benefit:
- Reduced withholding
- Credit method
- Exemption method
```

## Transfer Pricing

- Arm's length
- Documentation
- Advance pricing

slides.title: Tax Planning
slides.content:
# Legitimate Planning

## Deductions

| Section | Benefit |
|---------|--------|
| 80C | Rs 1.5 lakh |
| 80D | Medical insurance |
| 80G | Donations |
| 80GG | House rent |

## Capital Gains Exemption

| Section | Condition |
|---------|----------|
| 54 | Residential house |
| 54EC | Bonds |
| 54F | Any asset |

## Planning vs Evasion

- Legal arrangement = Planning
- Illegal concealment = Evasion
